backend/main.mo: Actor module defining user profiles, workouts, calendar keys, and storage maps with authorization checks and update functions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing added water/protein trackers and related frontend files with metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend components and screens used across the app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining light/dark theme CSS variables and base styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document mounting the app root and loading the main React entry file.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component configuring theme, query client, tabs, and main screens.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Header showing app branding, user name, theme toggle, and auth button.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Layout wrapper combining header, main content area, and bottom navigation.
frontend/src/components/AsyncState.tsx: Utility component handling loading, error, and empty states for async data.
frontend/src/components/AuthButton.tsx: Button handling Internet Identity login/logout and clearing React Query cache.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Bottom navigation bar switching between app tabs with icons.
frontend/src/components/CompletionToggle: Button to toggle workout completion for a date, handling skip state and auth constraints.
frontend/src/components/DateSelector.tsx: Provides a date picker with previous/next day buttons and a popover calendar for selecting a date.
frontend/src/components/DietEditDialog.t: Dialog for editing and saving per‑day meal overrides, allowing meal fields and settings to be updated or reset.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: Catches rendering errors and displays a reloadable error alert instead of the crashed UI.
frontend/src/components/ExerciseCard.tsx: Displays exercise details and includes a rest‑timer with start, pause, and reset controls.
Dialog for setting or updating user goal parameters like weight, workout frequency, and duration.
frontend/src/components/MealDayDetail.ts: Shows detailed meal cards for a day including nutrition info and veg/non‑veg status.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Prompts new authenticated users to enter their name and creates a default profile.
frontend/src/components/ProteinScoopsTra: Tracks and updates daily protein scoop count with increment/decrement controls.
frontend/src/components/RequireAuthNotic: Displays a sign‑in prompt alert when the user is not authenticated.
frontend/src/components/SafetyDisclaimer: Shows a safety disclaimer for either workouts or diet with predefined text.
frontend/src/components/SkipDayToggle.ts: Button to skip or unskip a workout or diet day, disabled when unauthenticated or pending.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx: Toggle button that switches between light and dark themes.
frontend/src/components/WaterGlassesTrac: Displays daily water intake with increment/decrement buttons using water glasses query hooks.
frontend/src/components/WaterReminderSet: Allows enabling and scheduling a daily water reminder, persisting settings in localStorage.
Renders a 7-day selector grid letting users choose a day index.
frontend/src/components/WeighInForm.tsx: Modal form for adding a new weight entry using the weight entry mutation.
frontend/src/components/WeighInList.tsx: Shows recent weight history with dates, using async state handling and weight entry queries.
frontend/src/components/WeightChart.tsx: Generates a simple SVG line chart of the last 10 weight entries with dynamic scaling.
frontend/src/components/WorkoutDayDetail: Displays workout or rest-day details with skip/completion controls and sectioned exercises.
frontend/src/components/WorkoutEditDialo: Dialog for editing a day's workout, allowing section/exercise modifications and save/reset actions.
frontend/src/data/mealPlan.ts: Defines Meal interface and a multi-day meal plan with nutritional details for each meal.
frontend/src/data/workoutPlan.ts: Defines workout data structures and provides a default multi-day workout plan with sections and exercises.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/queryKeys.ts: Exports centralized React Query keys, including date-scoped keys for workouts, diet, water, and protein.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useCurrentUse: Provides a query hook to fetch the authenticated user’s profile using the actor service.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useDietSkip.t: Implements localStorage‑based querying and mutation for tracking whether a user skipped their diet on a given date.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useProteinSco: Provides hooks to read and update protein scoop counts per date using local storage helpers.
Defines mutations to save or update a user profile via the backend actor and invalidates profile queries.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useWaterGlass: Provides hooks to fetch and update daily water glass counts using local storage utilities.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useWeightEntr: Implements queries and mutations for weight entries and latest weight using backend actor APIs.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useWorkoutCom: Provides hooks for workout completion records, stats, and date-scoped completion toggling via the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useWorkoutFor: Fetches or saves custom workouts per date, falling back to default workoutPlan when no override exists.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useWorkoutSki: Adds hooks to query and modify workout-skip status for a date through backend actor methods.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDietOverrides.ts: Manages diet overrides per user and date using localStorage with React Query hooks to fetch, save, and reset meal overrides.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity context and provider for authentication, loading stored identities, and handling login/logout via Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useIntervalTimer.ts: Implements a countdown timer hook with start, pause, reset, and progress tracking using intervals.
frontend/src/hooks/useWaterReminder.ts: Triggers daily water reminders via toasts and browser notifications at a user‑configured time.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, dark mode styles, and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that mounts React, providing React Query and Internet Identity context.
frontend/src/screens/DietScreen.tsx: Diet management screen showing meals, skip toggles, hydration/protein trackers, and an edit dialog.
frontend/src/screens/HomeScreen.tsx: Home dashboard showing user goals, workout stats, weight data, and goal editing options.
frontend/src/screens/ProgressScreen.tsx: Displays weight progress with charts, entry list, and a form to add new weigh‑in entries.
frontend/src/screens/WorkoutScreen.tsx: Workout screen that shows a selected day's workout, allows editing if authenticated, and displays loading skeletons while fetching data.
frontend/src/utils/date.ts: Utility functions for formatting, parsing, and manipulating YYYY-MM-DD dates and mapping them to weekdays.
frontend/src/utils/trackerStorage.ts: LocalStorage utilities for reading and writing per-date water glass and protein scoop counts with anonymous subject fallback.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage support and hash-routing compatibility.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, layout, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Metadata describing the project’s tracking features, requirements, and pending requests.
